ygData.subject: Re: New Comers/Interview with Rodimus
ygData.msgSnippet: Night Shade took a step back and looked at them each in turn, suddnly very glad she turned Maximal. Looks like the pred might have a reason now to turn tail

Night Shade took a step back and looked at them each in turn, suddnly 
very glad she turned Maximal. "Looks like the pred might have a 
reason now to turn tail and run." She looked at the orginal two. "You 
must be happy to have your friends back." She smiles slightly.


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Jerame Johnson <jeramej@y...> wrote:
> OOC: yes it would be.
> Dragos/Deepstar:
> As they finish with the last Bot they activate the beast scanners. 
One scans a bear, One scans a a scorpion, Another scans a cheetah and 
the last one scans a camealeon.
> Dragos/deepstar disconnects and tels them "Welcome back old 
friends. ANCIENT TRANSFORM" as all six forms together to form a 
Stronger looking robot, Deepstar forms a right arm with the fangs as 
two spikes, the Scordion forms the other arm with the Tail as a whip, 
the Cheetah and Cameleon formf the legs Dragos forms the chest and 
the bear forms the back.
> "We are ancient, A pleasure to meet you." as Ancient bows"you 
already know a third of us. beast mode"
> as the six transformers disconnect.
> " I am cooley," the Camealeon said
> "I am silverstrike" Th scorcpion grins
> "Slick Daggers" The cheatah say while he is twirling two daggers
> "Rock Tower is the name and crushing skulls is the game" the Bear 
said
>
